title: Am I Obligated to Have a Relationship With My Dad?
description:
Ashley's estranged father is sick, old and alone, and she's wondering if she should try to rekindle a relationship with him. - Dr. Laura: "Circumstances may have changed, but that doesn't mean he has."

Were you able to improve your parent-child relationship later in life? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
